to maybe take more than they should, and I've seen that before

It's happened so fast, so I wonder if it's real.

♪ And dance with the devil ♪

♪ And dance with the devil ♪
 Meira, what would you choose?

Meira, em sẽ chọn gì?

To be deaf for the rest of your life or blind for the rest of your life?

I'm pretty quiet already

-And you picked me? -Yes.
 I don't know how this is going to work.

- Thế mà lại chọn anh. - Vâng, em biết.

Phải, nhưng có sự cân bằng.
 - Anh sẽ học được thôi. - Chúa ơi.

Sometimes I'm too tired to talk.

Đôi khi em mệt không có sức nói chuyện.

Could we just be quiet?"

If you and I hang out, that's a social context.
 -Yes, but… we're also a couple. -Yes.

is that something you would want?

tận hưởng sự im lặng, em muốn như thế à?

I'm an analytical person, so when there's something I don't understand,

Anh là kiểu người thích phân tích. Khi không hiểu điều gì đó,

I'm just trying.

en: Mm.

and I want so much from her,

that they shouldn't be there.

I'm going crazy.

Ôi.

it's an exhale and a sigh.
 - Okay. -Yes.

-Should I be worried? -Yes.

Đừng nói thế, ghê quá!
